data.name: AppName
data.value: Service Fabric Local Cluster Manager

data.name: ClusterAlreadyRunningBalloonTip
data.value: The cluster is already running or pending start.

data.name: ClusterAlreadySetupBalloonTip
data.value: The local cluster is already set up.

data.name: ClusterAlreadyStoppedBalloonTip
data.value: The local cluster is already stopped or pending stop.

data.name: ClusterFiveNodeSwitchConfirmation
data.value: Existing cluster will be removed. Are you sure you want to switch to a 5-node local cluster?

data.name: ClusterMode_FiveNode
data.value: 5 Node

data.name: ClusterMode_OneNode
data.value: 1 Node

data.name: ClusterNotSetupOrNotRunning
data.value: Either no local cluster exists or it is not running.

data.name: ClusterOneNodeSwitchConfirmation
data.value: Existing cluster will be removed. Are you sure you want to switch to a 1-node local cluster?

data.name: ClusterResetConfirmation
data.value: Existing cluster will be removed. Are you sure you want to reset the local cluster?

data.name: ClusterResetFailedBalloonTip
data.value: Failed to reset the local cluster.

data.name: ClusterResetSuccessBalloonTip
data.value: Local cluster reset completed successfully.

data.name: ClusterRunningLongerConnectBalloonTip
data.value: The local cluster is running but taking longer than expected to connect.

data.name: ClusterSetupFailedBalloonTip
data.value: Failed to setup local cluster.

data.name: LogInfoBalloonTip
data.value: Detailed log available at

data.name: ClusterSetupSuccessBalloonTip
data.value: Local cluster setup completed successfully.

data.name: ClusterStartConnectBalloonTip
data.value: Local cluster started successfully. Trying to connect now. This may take a few minutes.

data.name: ConnectClusterFailBalloonTip
data.value: Failed to connect to cluster. The local cluster is not running.

data.name: ConnectClusterSuccessBalloonTip
data.value: Successfully connected to local cluster.

data.name: ConnectClusterToolTip
data.value: Waiting for local cluster to be ready...
